segments.text: I can't help but laugh at the scene unfolding in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, it's almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing and I just want to shout, 'Look behind you!'
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically doing a balancing act on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's going to make it or if he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's the smart one, letting her brother do all the work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't wait to see what happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a silent comedy routine.
segments.speaker: PAR
